summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of LuxScaler v27 'Friendly UI' Update. All critical requirements verified successfully including new authentication flow, mode selection, and friendly slider implementation.
passed_tests: Mode selection displays all 3 modes: USER MODE, PRO MODE, PROLUX MODE
PRO MODE selection successfully navigates to dashboard
Friendly slider names from ui_meta.py are displayed correctly
LIMPIEZA DE ARTEFACTOS slider shows friendly description
Raw snippet text is hidden from main UI (available in tooltips)
Slider level indicators work correctly (MED, HIGH, etc.)
All 27 Radix UI sliders are functional
